text: eki sampurna paniwidaya pahatha paridiya.

pohottuwen-janasetha peramunen dun namayojana bala rahitha karanna shrilanipa maha lekamgen pethsamak | dinamina niwasa pohottuwen-janasetha peramunen dun namayojana bala rahitha karanna shrilanipa maha lekamgen pethsamak idiri palath palana mathiwaranayedi aththanagalla pradeshiya sabhawa sandaha tharaga kirimata shri lanka podujana peramuna saha jana setha peramunen idiripath karana lada namayojana pathra bala rahitha karana niyogayak nikuth karana lesa illa shri lanka nidahas paksha mahalekam duminda disanayaka mahatha athulu thidenaku eeye (05) shreshtadhikaranayata rit pethsamak gonu kalaha.

thawaraja (wipaksha nayaka uthura palath sabhawa saha hitapu parlimenthu manthri), kushan da alwis (janadhipathi nithignya), aacharya harini amarasuriya (samajawidya jyeshta kathikacharya shri lanka wiwrutha wishwawidyalaya), aacharya kumudu kusum kumara (samajawidya jyeshta kathikacharya kolambaa wishwawidyalaya), sunil jayarathna (jyeshta nithignya), mahacharya upul aberathna (deshapalana widya jyeshta kathikacharya ruhunu wishwawidyalaya), themiya el. bi. hurulle (hitapu widya ha thakshana niyojya amathya parlimenthu manthri), sangharan wijaya sandiran (aarthika widya jyeshta kathikacharya peradeniya wishwawidyalaya), em. wayi. em. fayis (jyeshta nithignya), em. ke. nadika damayanthi (deshapalana widya jyeshta kathikacharya kalaniya wishwawidyalaya), kanthi ranasinha (jyeshta nithignya), es. si. si. ilankowan (siwil samaja kriyakari), sirimasiri hapuaarachchi (deshapalana kriyakari) janatha adahaswalata ida mahajana adahas wimasime kamituwa sidukale rate janathawage yojana likhithawa ha wachikawa labagena ema yojana kisi sanshodhanayakin thorawa ketumpath kara kamituwe nirdeshaya samangin shri lanka parlimenthuwe aandukrama wyawastha sampadana mandalayata idiripath kirimayi.
eheth niyangaya ese nowe.
